story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0100:
Those Rockets really had a plan this time.
How tricky...
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0200:
We heard that they ransacked the professor’s lab.
Do you know what they were after?
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0300:
I imagine they’d be after the professor’s research
on sync stones.
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0400:
She’s been studying sync pairs and their bonds
here on Pasio.
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0500:
And she’s also been analyzing how the energy
within sync stones can affect Pokémon.
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0600:
I see... So they probably couldn’t find the data
and took her instead?
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0700:
I’d imagine so. By the time we got back, she was
nowhere to be found!
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0800:
We tried looking for clues on where they might
have taken her, but we didn’t find anything.
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_0900: Tch. So we’re back to square one.
story_teamrocket_01_07000/2401_1201_1000:
And we still haven’t heard from Red, either...
This isn’t looking so good.
